titles.title: A bill for the relief of Richard F. Walsh.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From Air Force.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Authorizes the President to award the Distinguished Flying Cross and the Purple Heart to a named individual for his act of heroism and injuries received during service with the Army Air Force in World War II.
